item.title: Version 1.2 for Leopard
item.description:
ImageOptim now requires Leopard (10.5.7).

  • New: Leaner and more stable thanks to new Leopard APIs.
  • New: Can handle order of magnitude more files at once.
  • New: Avoids writing many files to disk at the same time.
  • New: Checks actual file type rather than rely on filename extension.
  • New: PNGOUT may be gracefully stopped if takes too much time to optimize.
  • Fix: Temporary files are cleaned up on exit.
  • Fix: Errors during optimisations don't slow down or lock up ImageOptim.

item.title: Version 1.2.1 for Leopard
item.description:
• Updated Polish localization (more translations welcome!)
  • Fixed progress indicator

New in 1.2:

  • Requires Leopard (10.5.7)
  • Leaner and more stable thanks to new Leopard APIs
  • Can handle order of magnitude more files at once
  • Avoids writing many files to disk at the same time
  • Checks actual file type rather than rely on filename extension
  • PNGOUT may be gracefully stopped if takes too much time to optimize
  • Temporary files are cleaned up on exit
